xwikidoc.title: Elastic Search Macros and Samples
xwikidoc.content:
Sample usage of the macros
* [[QueryMacroSample]] usage of the esquery macro * [[QueryMacroWithGraphSample]] usage of the esquery macro combined with the chart macro * [[Kibana4MacroSample]] usage of the kibana4 macro * [[QuerySample]] usage of the groovy code to display Elastic Search query results in a custom way
